summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Way We Were, The
Review Date: 2015/09/27
Categories: Drama, Passionate, Sad, Sentimental
Product Description: ['Set during the politically charged time of pre-WWII McCarthyism, a young couple with diametrically opposing views of politics, friendships and careers find it difficult to balance their private love and desires with their very public lives.']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pollack', 'Sydney'], 'Producers': ['Ray Stark'], 'Starring': ['Barbra Streisand', 'Robert Redford', 'Bradford Dillman']}
Review Text: Most movies have happy endings. The ending is not horible but its not a good one. I wish the main character would had fought for his wife, specialy because it is because of her that he got to the top! Never even notice him being depress or ask for a second opportunity or do anything to save the marriage. It broke my heart!
Review Title: Upset! No happy ending to an amazong movie!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/10/05
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Radha Bharadwaj'], 'Producers': ['Radha Bharadwaj', 'Gregory Cascante', 'Mike Cline', 'Christian Slater'], 'Starring': ['Jared Leto', 'Christian Slater', 'Claire Forlani'], 'Studio': ['Multicom Entertainment Group (MEG)']}
Review Text: The only reason why i gave this movie a 4 n not a  5 star is because basil didnt mary clara at the end.
Review Title: Amazing movie.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Song
Review Date: 2015/12/26
Categories: Drama, Romance, Inspiring, Mystical
Product Description: ['An aspiring singer-songwriter is struggling to catch a break and escape the long shadow of his famous father until he writes a love song that catapults him to stardom.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Ramsey'], 'Producers': ['Shane Sooter', 'Cassandra Pelan'], 'Starring': ['Ali Faulkner', 'Alan Powell', 'Caitlin Nicol-Thomas']}
Review Text: I love the lessons this movie teaches! Most humans are just worried about providing, they forget to protect the most important things Love (God) and family!!!!!!
Review Title: Sooo worth it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/12/29
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John Korty'], 'Producers': ['David V. Picker'], 'Starring': ["Ryan O'Neal", 'Candice Bergen', 'Nicola Pagett'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']}
Review Text: Not enough plot. Is nice to see that oliver at the end realise that he needs to live a living life againg, but theres not a true happy ending of maybe him remarrying n living happely ever after.
Review Title: Its ok
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/01/07
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sam Mendes'], 'Producers': ['Sam Mendes', 'Gina Amoroso', 'Bobby Cohen', 'Henry Fernaine', 'Pippa Harris', 'John Hart', 'Peter Kalmbach', 'Marion Rosenberg', 'Ann Ruark', 'Scott Rudin'], 'Starring': ['Leonardo DiCaprio', 'Kate Winslet', 'Michael Shannon'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures Corp.']}
Review Text: The plot was not big neither interesting, no surprises to make this movie exited.
Review Title: Not my cup of tea!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/06/17
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bryan Carzan'], 'Producers': ['Bryan Carzan', 'Anthony Straga'], 'Starring': ['Brad Johnson', 'Shona Kay'], 'Studio': ['SunWorld Pictures']}
Review Text: Awwww
Review Title: Nice clean
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Just a Little Chemistry
Review Date: 2017/12/25
Categories: Comedy, Arthouse, Romance, International
Product Description: ['Nineteen year old Oli falls for her TV idol and embarks on a Cinderella-like romance filled with luxury, fame, success and money. It seems she has found her fairy tale ending, until she learns good chemistry and true love are not one and the same.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alfonso Albacete'], 'Producers': ['Mar Targarona', 'Joaquin Padro'], 'Starring': ['Ana Fernandez', 'Alejo Sauras', 'Rodrigo Guirao']}
Review Text: you just have to see it
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Unbroken: Path to Redemption
Review Date: 2018/12/19
Categories: Drama, Compelling, Emotional, Tense
Product Description: ["Beginning where the hit movie Unbroken concludes, the next chapter brings the rest of Louis Zamperini's inspirational true story to life."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Harold Cronk'], 'Producers': ['Matthew Baer', 'Mike Elliott'], 'Starring': ['Samuel Hunt', 'Merritt Patterson', 'Vincenzo Amato']}
Review Text: This movie is amazing! Dude to diferent kind of child hood abuses  n having a big trigger as an adult I also had ptsd! Once I started to hear preachers on how important it is to be fill with Gods spirit, and to renew my mind my focusing on him not on my pain , so i started to focus on  Jesus and Jesus heal me! I used to go all around college crying.  Many people use to stop me and ask me what was wrong. I used to lied and said I had a bad case of sinuses! NOw i go around college, telling people my testimony and a healing Christian program call celebrate recovery!  this is a must watch story!
Review Title: WOW!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2021/02/04
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Hill'], 'Producers': ['Marvin Peart', 'Rosa Morris Peart', 'Phillip Glasser'], 'Starring': ['Robert De Niro', 'Uma Thurman', 'Rob Riggle'], 'Studio': ['101 Films', 'LLC']}
Review Text: Unless is for free don't paid to rent it.
Review Title: Boring , doesn't have an exiting plot! Waste of money
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2021/11/02
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Joe Wright'], 'Producers': ['Tim Bevan', 'Eric Fellner', 'Paul Webster'], 'Starring': ['Saoirse Ronan', 'Ailidh Mackay', 'Brenda Blethyn']}
Review Text: according to psychology the main reason why people like to watch movies is because they like to feel the happy ending to a horible ploblem which most movies have but not this one. It leave u with an ugly feeling
Review Title: disapointed.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences & Patterns Summary:**

- **Genre Preferences:** Strong inclination towards **drama** and **romance**, with occasional interests in **comedy** and **inspirational** narratives.
  
- **Emotional Engagement:** Tendency to favor **emotionally charged** and **sentimental** stories; consistently prefers movies that evoke feelings of **sadness**, **passion**, and **compelling** narratives.

- **Plot Expectations:** Significant disappointment with **unresolved plotlines** or endings without **happy conclusions**; frequently expressed desire for characters to fight for love or face resolution.

- **Quality Ratings:** Generally provides **positive ratings** for films that meet emotional or inspirational criteria, indicating satisfaction with depth and character development. However, shows **frustration** toward films lacking engaging plots or favorable resolutions.

- **Religious and Inspirational Themes:** Recently demonstrated a preference for films with **Christian themes**, focusing on **renewal** and **healing**—signifying possible shift towards more meaningful content.

- **General Discontent:** Explicit dissatisfaction with certain films perceived as **boring** or lacking **exciting** plots; frequent mentions of **emotional letdown** when expectations of happiness are unmet.
